name: Just a Game (itch) (prostofficial)
description:
For your attention I present my new game "Just a Game". This time NO BETA OR DEMO !!! Complete, stable game.

The name of the game itself fully reflects the essence of the entire game. BUT IT DOESN'T MEAN THAT IT WILL BE BORING THERE. This time there will be no "acidic" colors, but there will be a continuation of my tradition, namely - the character is a square, but here he is a rectangle. Not intrigued / interested? Then here:

The game features:

1) 100 Complete levels with increasing difficulty.

2) Not boring gameplay.

3) A LITTLE HARDCORE!

4) Almost every 5 levels, more and more innovations appear.

5) Calm, relaxing music in the game.

6) Half pixel graphics (over 70%)

7) And much ...

If you are interested in me, then be kind, download the game, it is advisable to go to the end, since at the end ... well, you will find out yourself if you want to go to the end. And if you don't want to play, then ... Well, I hope there won't be such people. Do not forget to like the game and follow the news, as I will periodically update it. If you find bugs or want to share your impressions, then write in the comments, do not hesitate! I really enjoy reading the comments.

I hope you are interested. Thanks! :3 Control:

Control

↔ - move right and left.

↑ - jump.

ESC - exit to the main menu.

1 - get the gun.

0 - remove the pistol.

Z - Fire

I repeat - if you do not want suffering, then download the lite version. There is nothing cut off.

There is also a game on "Game Jolt" -https://gamejolt.com/games/justgame/652831
